1332360.name: First Parsec
1332360.description:
Spaceship
A single-seater, fast and agile. Your ship is equipped with a quirky onboard computer that will back you up with solid advice—or a funny story. In the quiet moments between blowing up enemies, you can take a break by picking new weapons or even swapping to an entirely different ship.

Galaxy
Several factions rule the galaxy, each with its own ideals and ways of enforcing them. Merchants, whose devotion to Profit knows no bounds. The Army, which seeks to impose order—its order—on the galaxy. And the Smokers, a gang of fanatics who want to bring chaos back to the universe.

Mission
Your main job is to deliver a package to a far-off customer, but that doesn’t mean you can’t do a little good along the way (or a little evil, depending on your perspective).

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
